speaker: speaker1
text: Could I see the manager please ? I have a complaint to make .

speaker: speaker2
text: Yes , I ’ m the manager here . What can I do for you , Madam ?

speaker: speaker1
text: Did you have the room checked before we move in ?

speaker: speaker1
text: 1808 . The toilet doesn ’ t work properly , the water doesn ’ t run in the shower .

speaker: speaker2
text: I ’ m awfully sorry to hear that . I ’ ll turn to it right away .
